cu.explanation_en: Setting the remote SCTP port C to an out-of-range value of 99999 will cause connection establishment failures and prevent F1 interface communication.

du.explanation_en: Setting the number of uplink symbols to an invalid value of 20 will exceed the maximum allowed symbols for the TDD pattern and cause scheduling failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將上行符號數設定為無效的值 20，將超過 TDD 模式允許的最大符號數，並導致調度失敗。
